Total Time: 30 minutes
 
 Category: Lunch
 
 Serving Size: 4
 
 Ingredients:
 2 cans chicken broth
 1 cup water
 1 medium carrot
 1 stalk celery
 1 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
 1/2 lb skinless, boneless chicken
 1 oz. egg noodles
 

Instructions:
 1. Heat the broth, water, black pepper, carrot, celery and chicken in a saucepan over medium-high heat to a boil.
 2. Stir in the noodles. Reduce heat to medium 
 3. Cook until chicken is cooked through and the noodles are tender.
 4. Enjoy!
